posts.post_content:
**Aaron’s Random Card Comment of the Day #50, 1/3/11**   
   
This is kind of a funny card in that it shares a name with the ability it grants what it enchants. There are a few such examples of cards like these:
  
   
vigilance -> [Vigilance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vigilance)   
lifelink -> [Lifelink](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lifelink)   
flying -> [Flight](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Flight) (close enough)
  
   
Of course, there are more single keywords granted by Auras that do not share a name with them:
  
   
trample -> [Primal Frenzy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Primal Frenzy)   
first strike -> [Lance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lance), [Reflexes](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reflexes)   
double strike -> [Battle Mastery](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Battle Mastery)   
defender -> [Guard Duty](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Guard Duty)   
swampwalk -> [Leshrac's Rite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Leshrac's Rite)   
mountainwalk -> [Burrowing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Burrowing)   
forestwalk -> [Dryad's Favor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dryad's Favor)   
islandwalk -> [Fishliver Oil](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fishliver Oil)   
   
Maybe I’m forgetting some, but in general we don’t match the name to the ability. In fact, check out this one from *Legen... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)*

lifelink -> Lifelink

Of course, there are more single keywords granted by Auras that do not share a name with them:

first strike -> Lance, Reflexes
double strike -> Battle Mastery

swampwalk -> Leshrac's Rite
mountainwalk -> Burrowing

islandwalk -> Fishliver Oil

Maybe I’m forgetting some, but in general we don’t match the name to the ability. In fact, check out this one from Legen... (see all)

Posted By: Aaron_Forsythe (1/3/2011 4:40:07 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Uh, that's quite the creative name. "Vigilance - gives vigilance." Wowee.
  
   
Because of this, I think Vigilance should *actually* be keyworded as "[Eternal Warrior](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Eternal Warrior)." Trample should be [Primal Frenzy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Primal Frenzy); First Strike should be [Lance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lance). And of course, who could deny the awesome might of the [Mountain Goat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mountain Goat), with its awe-inspiring [Burrowing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Burrowing) powers. That's right, a burrowing mountain goat.
  
   
Tremble in fear.
posts.html:

And of course, who could deny the awesome might of the Mountain Goat, with its awe-inspiring Burrowing powers. That's right, a burrowing mountain goat.

Tremble in fear.

posts.post_content: Why is this card rated so badly? Vigilance is my second favourite ability, after trample, and its very useful to be able to attack with something like a 6/6 and then still be able to block with it on my next turn. And for one mana, it's a steal! Yeah, you could "just Naturalize it", but still its only ONE. FRIGGIN. MANA.
